name: Split Signs
description:
• It's a game where you need to split signs to gain points. If you don't get to split the signs you will lose.
  • It's hard to play on a PC because it's made for 2 finger touch.
  • I added a highscore system so you can see how good you are.
  • Because it is a prototype there is no save system.
How its made

This game was made in a 3-day mobile game jam.
